description: The highlight of this upside-down caramelised banana cake is its sticky, golden caramel. You'll be wanting seconds of this lavish yet easy dessert!
name: Upside-Down Caramelised Banana Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon mixture into pan and smooth top. Bake for 50 minutes or until a skewer inserted into centre comes out clean. Stand for 10 minutes before carefully turning out on a plate. Serve with cream.
